base_effect.answer:
One possible version:
How to Protect OurselvesNo matter who you are, what you do, safety is the most important. How to protect ourselves is especially important to us students.
First, we should respect the teachers and the elder, and at the same time, we need to get on well with our classmates. Secondly, we should behave well in public. Don’t run after each other. Don’t crowd with each other especially when we go upstairs or downstairs. Thirdly, we should be careful when we make friends, especially online. Don’t give our personal information to them. Last but not least, it’s important for us to eat more healthy food and obey the traffic rules.Danger is never as far away as we think. Take good care of ourselves at all times!
base_effect.userAnswer:
How to Protect Ourselves
Hi , I'm LiHua . To stay safe , we should
remem ber three things . First , don't share
personal in information online ; use strong
passwords . Second , obey traffic rules and
wear a helmet when riding . Third , if a
stranger offers a ride , say no quickly and
call 110 . Safety is everyone's job . Let's start today!

base_effect.answer:
One possible version:
How to Protect OurselvesNo matter who you are, what you do, safety is the most important. How to protect ourselves is especially important to us students.
First, we should respect the teachers and the elder, and at the same time, we need to get on well with our classmates. Secondly, we should behave well in public. Don’t run after each other. Don’t crowd with each other especially when we go upstairs or downstairs. Thirdly, we should be careful when we make friends, especially online. Don’t give our personal information to them. Last but not least, it’s important for us to eat more healthy food and obey the traffic rules.Danger is never as far away as we think. Take good care of ourselves at all times!

How to Protect OurselvesNo matter who you are, what you do, safety is the most important. How to protect ourselves is especially important to us students.

How to Protect OurselvesNo matter who you are, what you do, safety is the most important. How to protect ourselves is especially important to us students.

base_effect.answer:
One possible version:
How to Protect OurselvesNo matter who you are, what you do, safety is the most important. How to protect ourselves is especially important to us students.
First, we should respect the teachers and the elder, and at the same time, we need to get on well with our classmates. Secondly, we should behave well in public. Don’t run after each other. Don’t crowd with each other especially when we go upstairs or downstairs. Thirdly, we should be careful when we make friends, especially online. Don’t give our personal information to them. Last but not least, it’s important for us to eat more healthy food and obey the traffic rules.Danger is never as far away as we think. Take good care of ourselves at all times!

stranger offers a ride , say no quickly and
call 110 . Safety is everyone's job . Let's start today!

base_effect.answer:
One possible version:
How to Protect OurselvesNo matter who you are, what you do, safety is the most important. How to protect ourselves is especially important to us students.
First, we should respect the teachers and the elder, and at the same time, we need to get on well with our classmates. Secondly, we should behave well in public. Don’t run after each other. Don’t crowd with each other especially when we go upstairs or downstairs. Thirdly, we should be careful when we make friends, especially online. Don’t give our personal information to them. Last but not least, it’s important for us to eat more healthy food and obey the traffic rules.Danger is never as far away as we think. Take good care of ourselves at all times!
